Pre-Game Insights: Mumbai Police conducted a mock drill at Wankhede Stadium ahead of the World Cup match between England and South Africa on October 21, 2023. The police also issued guidelines for spectators, encouraging the use of public transportation and prohibiting certain items inside the stadium.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The World Cup 2023 matches were scheduled at Wankhede Stadium, including the clash between England and South Africa on October 21, 2023.
Others: Mumbai Police urged spectators to report any suspicious objects or persons to the nearest security personnel.
